channel.title: Java is not recgonized an an enternal or external command
channel.description:
Ok i need some help when i try to start my server or client it says Java is not recgonized an an enternal or external command so if someone could give me the right thing to put in it would be great!
Email me or post back Email:Riku9182@yahoo.com or Pein9182@yahoo.com
Thank you very much!!

item.title: Java is not recgonized an an enternal or external command
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you have JDK and are having trouble setting your classpaths, check out this thread:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375681.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Java is not recgonized an an enternal or external command

item.title: Java is not recgonized an an enternal or external command
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

If this is the first time you have this and it worked before, just restart your computer .
otherwise install JAVA JDK , And normal JAVA from www.java.com
Look for adding the correct did you mess up your paths? reset them and add the originals. U also can find them on

Chassy13:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375681.0.html

Read full topic
